text: Avaru (satkarmigalu), sanna putta pramadagala horatu, ella dodda papakrtyagalinda hagu aslila karyagalinda dura uliyuttare. Khanditavagiyu nim'modeyanu visala ksama guna ullavanagiddane. Avanantu, tanu nim'mannu bhumiyinda huttisidagalu, nivu nim'ma tayandira hottegalolage putta makkalagiddagalu nim'mannu cennagi ballanu. Nivu nim'ma pavitrada kuritu koccikollabedi. Dharmanisthanu yarembudannu avanu cennagi ballanu
